amendment.description: Amendment strikes the proviso preventing funds in the bill from being used to conduct public-private competitions or to direct A-76 conversions for any program, project or activity within the USDA without a contracting report to Congress by the Secretary.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the proviso relating to FAIR Act of Circular A-76 activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 199 (Roll no. 421).
